name: group_and_aggregate_data
description: Groups data by a specified column and aggregates another column using a specified function. Supports Excel and CSV files. Optionally, the result can be saved to a new file and sorted.

file_path.description: The path to the file (can be an Excel or CSV file).

sheet_name.description: Name or index of the Excel sheet to read. Ignored for CSV files.

group_by_column.description: The column name to group the data by.

agg_func.description: The aggregation function to use, such as "sum", "mean", "max", "min".

save_as.description: Optional. The file path to save the aggregated data (supports .xlsx or .csv files).

sort_type.description: Optional. The sorting order of the aggregated result: 0 (no sorting), 1 (descending), 2 (ascending). Default is 0.
